title: CONTEXT SKIN Long Lasting Hair Spray - Hair Care for Soft and Shinny hair, Hair Repair & Lightweight Hair Oil, Hair Heat Protector Spray, Hair Treatment for Strengthen Hair
features: SOFT & SHINING HAIR - If you want your hair to look lush and glossy, then you are in the right place. Context skin hair spray takes care of your hair, this hair gloss makes your hair healthy.
COMPLETE HAIR CARE SOLUTION - This hairspray is a complete hair styling treatment, as it is anti frizz, restores shine to hair and is lightweight. Its Vitamin E naturally improves your hair health

HIGHLY MOISTURIZING HAIR PROTEIN THERAPY - this Hair repair spray is an excellent hair protein treatment. Ideal for daily use, this lightweight anti frizz hair serum does not weigh hair down and can be used by men and women

PROTECTION FROM HEAT & POLLUTANTS - Context Hair Spray works as a heat protectant and thermal protector, Suitable for Fine, Thin, Thick, Coarse, Colored, Color Treated, Permed, Straight or Curly Hair. This hair oil has some excellent ingredients like Jojoba and Safflower Oils which leave hair shiny, soft, and conditioned. Also contains Birch Extract and Lemongrass Extract which protect and strengthen hair.
description: CONTEXT SKIN Gloss + Repair Spray - Hair Care For Soft And Shining Hair

This unique blend of Jojoba and Safflower oils leaves hair shiny and soft while Vitamin E nourishes for an all-around treatment leaving your hair healthy + happy, smooths frizzy ends and dries without a trace, Lightweight and non-greasy. Never feels heavy or weighs hair down.

- leave hair shiny, soft, and conditioned.

- Use on wet or dry hair before or after styling. Perfect for any hair type. Hold bottle 10 to 12 inches away from hair. Depress atomizer with quick uniform strokes for desired gloss. Respray where needed to restore shine and elegance.

Context Skin offers clean beauty and skincare products derived from natural ingredients like herbal extracts and rich botanical oils. We focus on developing pure, natural anti-aging solutions that work. Our mission is to become a go-to source for healthy beauty products for men and women.

Our vitamin-enriched skincare products are formulated for all skin types. We use potent antioxidants and natural botanical oils to moisturize and comfort the skin. Our products have all been dermatologist tested, are hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic.
Whatever product you choose, you can be sure it's made with high-quality ingredients, free of toxic chemicals and never tested on animals.
